Title.Language: Psali Adam (Lobsh) for the Second Canticle

Text.Language: Marenouwnh e~bol: m~Pi,~rictoc Pennou]: nem piiero'alt/c: Dauid pip~rov/t/c.
Let us give thanks: unto Christ our God: with David the Prophet: and the holy Psalmist.
فلنشكر المسيح الهنا مع المرتل داود النبى.
Je afyamio~ n~niv/oui: nem noudunamic: afhicen] m~pikahi: e~h~r/i hijen nimwou.
For He has made the heavens: and all its hosts: and established the earth: on the waters.
لأنه خلق السموات وجنودها وأسس الأرض على المياه.
Nai nis] m~vwct/r: pir/ nem piioh: af,au eue~rouwini: qen pic~terew~ma.
These two great stars: the sun and the moon: He has made to enlighten: the firmament.
هذان الكوكبان العظيمان الشمس والقمر جعلهما ينيران فى الفلك.
Afi~ni n~hany/ou: e~bol qen nefa~hwr: afnifi n~ca nis~s/n: san~touviri e~bol.
He brought forth the winds: out of His treasures: He breathed unto the trees: and they blossomed.
أخرج الرياح من خباياها نفح فى الأشجار حتى أزهرت.
Afhwou n~oumounhwou: hijen p~ho m~p~kahi: san~tefrwt e~p~swi: n~tef] m~pefoutah.
He caused the rain to fall: upon the face of the earth: and it sprouted: and gave its fruit.
أمطرا مطرا على وجه الأرض حتى أنبتت وأعطت ثمرها.
Afi~ni n~oumwou: e~bolqen oupetra: aft~co m~peflaoc: n~h~r/i hi p~safe.
He brought forth water: out of a rock: and gave it to His people: in the wilderness.
أخرج ماء من صخرة صماء وسقى شعبه فى البرية.
Afyamio m~pirwmi: kata pefi~ni: nem tefhikwn: eyrefc~mou e~rof.
He made man: in His image: and His likeness: that he may praise Him.
صنع الانسان كشبهه وصورته لكى يباركه.
Marenhwc e~rof: ten[ici m~pefran: tenouwnh naf e~bol: je pefnai sop sa e~neh.
Let us praise Him: and exalt His name: and give thanks to Him: His mercy endures forever.
فلنسبحه ونرفع اسمه ونشكره لأن رحمته كائنة الى الأبد.
Hiten nieu,/: n~te piiero'alt/c Dauid: Po#c# a~rih~mot nan: m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the prayers: of David the holy Psalmist: O Lord, grant us: the forgiveness of our sins.
بصلوات المرتل داود يارب أنعم لنا بمغفرة خطايانا.
Hiten nip~recbia: n~te ]yeo~tokoc e#y#u# Maria: Po#c# a~rih~mot nan: m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the intercessions: of the Mother of God Saint Mary: O Lord, grant us: the forgiveness of our sins.
بشفاعات والدة الاله القديسة مريم يارب أنعم لنا بمغفرة خطايانا.
Hiten nip~recbia: n~te p~,oroc t/rf n~te niaggeloc: Po#c# a~rih~mot nan: m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the intercessions: of the whole chorus of angels: O Lord, grant us: the forgiveness of our sins.
بشفاعات كل صفوف الملائكة يارب أنعم لنا بمغفرة خطايانا.
